GSD.product_version: versions from v4.13 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
gpu: host1x: Fix a memory leak in 'host1x_remove()'

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit c06577a80485511b894cb688e881ef0bc2d1d296, it was introduced in version v4.13 by commit 8474b02531c4881a762c52ef869c52429e38633f. For more details please see the references link.

OSV.summary: gpu: host1x: Fix a memory leak in 'host1x_remove()'
